segments.text: Whoa . Now I'm awake ! Zina has a secret admirer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really do not have time to deal with some lovesick computer geek .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean . I can't stand computer geeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , Dave , I didn't mean you . I am just not in the mood for this . I have work to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who do you think it is ?
segments.speaker: S1
